trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around September 6th 2011
Summary: was shooting a beam of light to the water tank while circling the tank
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Sept 6 2011 i observed a UFO shooting a beam of light at the water tank owned by the city water board on vanderbilt street on the south east side of town this is a large water tank an egg like object came out of the rear of the cylinder object and landed in the fenced in area at the base of the water tank an entity came out greeted another that was already on the ground they both boarded the egg shaped vehicle and zipped back to the cylinder the cylinder instantaniouls.
